TopicTitle: I made it to the Mun :D

Articles.Content:
I'm just stuck there for eternity since my lunar lander smashed into 15 different pieces.

Any chance or hope I can rescue this little guy?

Any chance or hope I can rescue this little guy?
Yeah, but you'll either have to build a three person lander and EVA one of them before lift-off, or add one of the modded parts that can hold extra crew.

Unlucky, if that is your first time landing on the moon, congrats! but getting him back might be a slight problem, your could send a 3 man craft with 2 kerbal's in it but even then landing in the right spot is still a bit tricky.... good luck tho

I did something like this the first time I tried to land there in 0.17.

Must have killed at least 50 kerbals developing the rescue ship for that lil guy

I did something like this the first time I tried to land there in 0.17.

Must have killed at least 50 kerbals developing the rescue ship for that lil guy

Are you a time traveler? Tell us more about .17
Liar! Tell us about the future! Who wins the Super Bowl?

Like everyone else said, the kerbal is pretty much stuck unless you send a rescue mission there to go pick him up (3 manned pod, EVA one at the launchpad) and bring him home.

Good job landing on the moon though.

thats how my first moon landing went, hes still up there actually, ive deployed 2 more ships to the mun, one my new lander (which one made it to minmum) and my rover, the rover will try to find teh location of the crash site, so that a third rescue ship can be sent.
Congratulations, over the course of the next month, it will be as easy as moving your finger.

Grats on making it there.

But yeah, I'd send a three kerbal craft with one or two EVAed out before launch.
Congrats on making it to the mun. It is such an awesome achievement when you first make it. One of the most gratifying things I have ever experienced in a video game.
